titleStmt.title: The remonstrance of the soldiery to the Right Honourable, the Lord Mayor, aldermen, and Common councell of the City of London
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.
Corporation of London (England) Lord Mayor.

notesStmt.note: Tendering their services to obtain a free Parliament at the time of the negotiations between the City and General Monck.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
